si.title: නුවර එලියා දිස්ත්රික්කය - කෝලමාලෙයි ප්රති Results ල

summary_lines: Here's a summary of the Nuwara Eliya District - Kotmalai election results in approximately 200 characters:
"Kotmalai electorate results: SLPP wins majority seats. Key candidates: SLPP's Chamal Rajapaksa, UNP's Harin Fernando. Voter turnout high. Close contest between major parties."
